pr_body:
<!--

Thank you for opening a new PR to the Unikraft Open Source Project!  We welcome
new changes, features, fixes, and more!  Please fill in this form to indicate
the status of your PR.  Please ensure you have read the contribution guidelines
before opening a new PR as this will cover the PR process:

  https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/

  Kraftkit follows the same guidelines as the Unikraft Open Source Project.

-->

### Prerequisite checklist

<!--
Please mark items appropriately:
-->

  - [x] Read the [contribution guidelines](https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/) regarding submitting new changes to the project;
  - [x] Tested your changes against relevant architectures and platforms;
  - [ ] Ran `make fmt` on your commit series before opening this PR;
  - [ ] Updated relevant documentation.

### Description of changes

Added a subcommand `show` for command `kraft pkg`.

Now any package information can be seen with the help of command `kraft pkg show packName` in the format of YAML|JSON .
<!--
Please provide a detailed description of the changes made in this new PR.
-->

<!--

Thank you for opening a new PR to the Unikraft Open Source Project!  We welcome
new changes, features, fixes, and more!  Please fill in this form to indicate
the status of your PR.  Please ensure you have read the contribution guidelines
before opening a new PR as this will cover the PR process:

  https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/

  Kraftkit follows the same guidelines as the Unikraft Open Source Project.

-->

### Prerequisite checklist

<!--
Please mark items appropriately:
-->

  - [x] Read the [contribution guidelines](https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/) regarding submitting new changes to the project;
  - [ ] Tested your changes against relevant architectures and platforms;
  - [ ] Ran `make fmt` on your commit series before opening this PR;
  - [ ] Updated relevant documentation.

### Description of changes

This PR adds `kraft lib create` support for Kraftkit.
<!--
Please provide a detailed description of the changes made in this new PR.
-->

```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 20, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422643070, 'comment_body': 'GitHub likes American formatting üò∞ 

```suggestion
		Short:   "Initialize a library from a template",
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 23, 32, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422656640, 'comment_body': 'For everything prompt related there are now tools inside kraftkit that can handle those, for example you can use `selection.Select` to make users select between `yes` and `no` (see https://github.com/unikraft/kraftkit/blob/staging/tui/selection/select.go )

For the ones that requires users to specify a name, you will have to create another package `specify` or `prompt` or something else, which waits for a user given string
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 31, 33, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422656902, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 31, 46, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657059, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 31, 53, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657193, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 31, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657343, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 32, 3, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657462, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 32, 8, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657701, 'comment_body': 'Why is this commented out?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 32, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422657892, 'comment_body': 'See comment above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 32, 26, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422658409, 'comment_body': 'See comment above

I would specify that the Main file is actually C', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 47, 31, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422690134, 'comment_body': 'Is the slash mandatory?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 48, 8, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422698795, 'comment_body': 'I would move the whole `git init` code to a separate helper function, as it feels a bit separate from the rest of the function.

Tha's why removed üëçüèΩ ", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 25, 12, 20, 57, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436077289, 'comment_body': 'Created a separate function for it üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 25, 12, 21, 42, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410495, 'comment_body': 'Made a new package `specify` üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 27, 13, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410573, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 27, 25, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410662, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 27, 38, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410746, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 27, 51, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410813, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 28, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436410866, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 26, 11, 28, 14, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1436411324, 'comment_body': "This is optinal, User can rename it if they want and this was inserted to ease creating a new library template (Where user don't have to think much & keep entering on default values to set)

pr_body:
<!--

Thank you for opening a new PR to the Unikraft Open Source Project!  We welcome
new changes, features, fixes, and more!  Please fill in this form to indicate
the status of your PR.  Please ensure you have read the contribution guidelines
before opening a new PR as this will cover the PR process:

  https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/

  Kraftkit follows the same guidelines as the Unikraft Open Source Project.

-->

### Prerequisite checklist

<!--
Please mark items appropriately:
-->

  - [x] Read the [contribution guidelines](https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/) regarding submitting new changes to the project;
  - [ ] Tested your changes against relevant architectures and platforms;
  - [ ] Ran `make fmt` on your commit series before opening this PR;
  - [ ] Updated relevant documentation.

### Description of changes

Added new command for `kraft pkg add`
<!--
Please provide a detailed description of the changes made in this new PR.
-->
pr_review_comments:
[{'comment_id': 1266383208, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
	if len(args) == 0 {
		return fmt.Errorf("Package Name is not specified to add to the project")
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 18, 7, 57, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1266383797, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
	if len(packs) != 1 {
		return fmt.Errorf("Specified package not found")
	}
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 18, 7, 58, 10, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1268204805, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 19, 14, 58, 48, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1268205129, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 19, 14, 59, 1, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422711569, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
	Kraftfile  string `long:"kraftfile" short:"K" usage:"Set an alternative path of the Kraftfile"`
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 57, 8, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422712047, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
	Workdir    string `long:"workdir" short:"w" usage:"workdir to add the package to"`
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 57, 30, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422712717, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
// Add adds a Unikraft library to the project directory and updates the Kraftfile
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422721106, 'comment_body': 'Is there any other make that you had to rename? Just wondering

If the renaming is optional, can you please revert üôè ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 16, 2, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428734688, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 8, 6, 11, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428734699, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 8, 6, 19, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428734771, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 8, 6, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428736170, 'comment_body': "Yup! there is golang's default `make()` function that I used at line number 1034 `make(map[string]*lib.LibraryConfig)`, That's why I had to rename kraftkit's `make` to `kraftMake` in `unikraft/app/application.go`", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 8, 12, 50, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428899781, 'comment_body': 'Instead of replacing all instances of `make` with `kraftMake`, simply instantiate the structure like so:
```go
if app.libraries == nil {
  app.libraries = map[string]*lib.LibraryConfig{}
}
```
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 19, 54, 7, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'nderjung', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428900055, 'comment_body': 'To be consistent with the other subcommands which have a similar flag:
```diff
- FromServer bool   `long:"from-server" usage:"Force package manager to use manifests of the server"`
+ NoUpdate   bool   `long:"no-update" usage:"Do not update package index before running the build"`
```
Also ensure that entries are sorted alphabetically.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 19, 55, 21, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'nderjung', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428900188, 'comment_body': '`library name is not specified`', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 19, 56, 2, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'nderjung', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428900386, 'comment_body': 'Also check for greater than 1 option and create an error that outputs the list of options as an error.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 19, 56, 46, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'nderjung', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428900533, 'comment_body': "Let's call it `PROJECT LIBRARY COMMANDS`", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 19, 57, 23, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'nderjung', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1429092447, 'comment_body': 'this for all  of them then :D', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 17, 9, 20, 9, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1433725826, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 21, 8, 31, 39, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1433726431, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 21, 8, 32, 11, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1433726805, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 21, 8, 32, 30, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1433727439, 'comment_body': 'Done üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 21, 8, 33, 1, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1434980019, 'comment_body': 'This fails when trying to pull packages because it prepends `lib/` on urls :(

Also this did not work for me:
```
kraft lib add github.com/unikraft/lib-nginx.git

 D  kraftkit v0.7.1-36-g78e0abd-6-g2ad720ea
 T  initializing package manager format=oci
 T  using oci directory handler path=/home/cez/.local/share/kraftkit/runtime/oci
 T  initializing package manager format=manifest
 E  cannot determine name and type from "lib-nginx.git"
```

For the second one, if there is no way to do it, just remove the example from the help message above', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 22, 11, 30, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_body:
<!--

Thank you for opening a new PR to the Unikraft Open Source Project!  We welcome
new changes, features, fixes, and more!  Please fill in this form to indicate
the status of your PR.  Please ensure you have read the contribution guidelines
before opening a new PR as this will cover the PR process:

  https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/

  Kraftkit follows the same guidelines as the Unikraft Open Source Project.

-->

### Prerequisite checklist

<!--
Please mark items appropriately:
-->

  - [x] Read the [contribution guidelines](https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/) regarding submitting new changes to the project;
  - [] Tested your changes against relevant architectures and platforms;
  - [ ] Ran `make fmt` on your commit series before opening this PR;
  - [ ] Updated relevant documentation.

### Description of changes

The command `kraft pkg remove` removes library from the project directory and updates `kraftfile` (Opposite of `kraft pkg add` )
<!--
Please provide a detailed description of the changes made in this new PR.
-->
pr_review_comments:
[{'comment_id': 1266356534, 'comment_body': 'I think you can use the `application` struct below, why not use that and call `NewApplicationFromInterface` on that?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 18, 7, 35, 39, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1266365422, 'comment_body': 'you can just `filepath.Join` to create the path more easily', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 18, 7, 43, 1, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1266372992, 'comment_body': 'also you can use symbols from `unikraft/unikraft.go` and `unikraft/type.go`', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 18, 7, 49, 16, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1268023436, 'comment_body': 'Great! ```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 14, 38, 45, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422617652, 'comment_body': 'This method breaks the ordering of the the `kraft.yaml`. It basically orders the keys alphabetically.

I suggest you try using `mergeOverExistingKraftfile(ctx, yamlMap)` and see if that helps. Also try `saveNewKraftfile(ctx, yamlMap)`. If that also does not work, look over this <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70777144/go-unmarshal-yaml-and-preserve-order>', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 7, 27, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1422625898, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
	Workdir   string `long:"workdir" short:"w" usage:"workdir to remove lib from"`
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 11, 15, 12, 46, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428721298, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 7, 4, 59, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428721399, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 7, 5, 11, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428721466, 'comment_body': 'Done! üëçüèΩ ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 7, 5, 23, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1428732505, 'comment_body': '`saveNewKraftfile(ctx, yamlMap)` resolve this problem :)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 12, 16, 7, 56, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_body:
<!--

Thank you for opening a new PR to the Unikraft Open Source Project!  We welcome
new changes, features, fixes, and more!  Please fill in this form to indicate
the status of your PR.  Please ensure you have read the contribution guidelines
before opening a new PR as this will cover the PR process:

  https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/

  Kraftkit follows the same guidelines as the Unikraft Open Source Project.

-->

### Prerequisite checklist

<!--
Please mark items appropriately:
-->

  - [x] Read the [contribution guidelines](https://unikraft.org/docs/contributing/) regarding submitting new changes to the project;
  - [ ] Ran `make fmt` on your commit series before opening this PR;
  - [ ] Tested your changes against relevant architectures and platforms;
  - [ ] Updated relevant documentation.

### Description of changes
Added subcommand remove for the command kraft pkg that removes the pulled package locally on the system.
<!--
Please provide a detailed description of the changes made in this new PR.
-->

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ configs

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ layers

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ manifests
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.unikraft.io
    ‚îÇ\xa0\xa0 ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unikraft.org
    ‚îÇ\xa0\xa0     ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx
    ‚îÇ\xa0\xa0         ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ latest.json
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unikraft.org
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 10, 2, 9, 3, 26, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'craciunoiuc', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1343037800, 'comment_body': '@craciunoiuc Now give it a try, Hoping will work fine :)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 10, 2, 18, 49, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'MdSahil-oss', 'type': 'User'}]
